plays.text: Penalty to Freddy Meyer 2 minutes for Hooking Mats Sundin
Goal scored by Pavel Kubina (Power Play) assisted by Carlo Colaiacovo and Alexander Steen
Penalty to Bruno Gervais 2 minutes for Hooking Alexander Steen
Goal scored by Trent Hunter assisted by Mike Sillinger and Andy Hilbert
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Jeff Tambellini and Viktor Kozlov
Goal scored by Bates Battaglia assisted by Boyd Devereaux and Chad Kilger
Penalty to Nik Antropov 2 minutes for Holding Chris Simon
Alexei Ponikarovsky shootout attempt against Rick DiPietro with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Frans Nielsen shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Backhand results in a GOAL.
Viktor Kozlov shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Backhand results in a GOAL.
Miroslav Satan shootout attempt against Andrew Raycroft with a Backhand results in a SAVE.
Nik Antropov shootout attempt against Rick DiPietro with a Wristshot results in a SAVE.
Mats Sundin shootout attempt against Rick DiPietro with a Wristshot results in a GOAL.
